div.ab:
بسم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحيم
هذه براه من الحسن بن فرّوخ عامل
الأمير غالب أصلحه اللّه على رزم ومدر
لقاروال بن مير إنّك أدّيت إلي ممّا صار عليك
في قصر يسكن وغندر من خراج سنة ثلث
وخمسين ومائة وتوابعه من القسم درهمين
پلپى درهم منها من الخراج درهمين ومن
القسم أربعة دونيق قبضت ذلك
منك وبرئت إلي منها وكتب في صفر
سنة خمس وخمسين ومائة

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
hāḏihi barāʾaẗ:un mina ăl ḥasani bni farrūḫa ʿāmili
ăl ʾamīri ġālib:in ʾaṣlaḥa hu ăl lāhu ʿalà rizma wa madra
li qārwāla bni mīr:in ʾinna ka ʾaddayta ʾilay ya mimmā ṣāra ʿalay ka
fī qaṣri yaskina wa ġandara min ḫarāǧi sanaẗi ṯalāṯ:in
wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in wa tawābiʿi hi mina ăl qisami dirhamayni
wa ṯulṯay dirham:in min hā mina ăl ḫarāǧi dirhamayni wa mina
ăl qisami ʾarbaʿaẗa dawānīqa qabaḍtu ḏālika
min ka wa bariʾta ʾilay ya min hā wa kutiba fī ṣafar:in
sanaẗa ḫams:in wa ḫamsīna wa miʾaẗ:in

In the name of God, the Merciful and Compassionate.
This is a quittance from al-Ḥasan ibn Farrukh, the financial administrator
of the governor Ġālib, may God grant him prosperity, (whose jurisdiction is) over Rizm and Madr,
to Qārwāl ibn Mīr. You have delivered to me what you owe
in the citadel of Yaskin and Ġandar with regard to the kharāj for the year
one hundred and fifty-three, and the portions that are linked to it, two dirhams and
two-thirds of a dānaq. Of these, two dirhams are for the kharāj and
four dānaqs are for the portions. I have received that
from you and you have been released from (the obligation to pay) them to me. It has been written in Ṣafar
of the year one hundred and fifty-five.
